title: PENNY PALABRAS 003 (2014) (Hollow Scene) (digital HD)
description:
Penny Palabras - Episode 03: The Detachment Bell

Publication Date: February 14, 2014

Penny Palabras, 17, is being tormented by the Straw Man. It seems that he's burned the library to the ground, ghosting the Librarian. Penny has her potential Ghost Accomplice, but she's surprised when a Tiger Devil is waiting for her in the darkness, offering help. Penny knows that devils are manipulative and can't be trusted, but her nightmares won't let her sleep, her friends and family can't understand, and the Straw Man is getting more powerful every day.

Illustrated by Patrick Beavers. -
Created and written by james b willard.
